scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:config && pnpm run dev:start
scripts.deploy: export RELEASE=$GITHUB_SHA && export $(../../scripts/gen-env) && pnpm build && pnpm source-map && wrangler deploy --var RELEASE:$RELEASE --env ${DEPLOY_ENV:-production} --no-bundle --node-compat false build/index.js
scripts.source-map: export $(../../scripts/gen-env) && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject build && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --release=$RELEASE --dist=worker build
